channel.title: [20k+ Downloads] [PI] Sagi X-evolution
channel.description:
[CENTER] [size=12pt]I quit hosting my server. So, im just going to release my source and client. :)
[b]Base: Project Insanity[/b]
[b]Features:[/b] -Working Easter ring, Ring of stone & NEW Glarial's Amulet tweak ;) -All dupes fixed. Some fixed dupes include: Arrow/bolt dupe, trade/bank/duel X-log dupe, Cheat Engine Dupe, Any other dupe? = FIXED :) -New Custom Minigame, leveling skills earn you points that can be used to buy items at shop -God Wars 3/4 bosses -Chaotic Rapier / Longsword / Maul with approximately correct stance and fighting style ADDED -All 6 Spirit Shields ADDED -Full Dragon Helmet ADDED -Berserker, Warrior, Archer, Seers Ring [b](i)[/b] ADDED ( the new imbued one ;) ) -Rocktail Food ADDED -Vengeance working !!! -Fully Working Enchanted Gem in shop -All Artefacts ADDED, you can activate them to retrieve cash :) -New HP Bars -New Helpful Quest tab interface -Many more things....im so tired to remember them :P
[NOTE: DROP RATE IS A BIT HIGH, BETTER LOWER IT ;)]
Now some pictures:
[b]Home (EDGEVILLE, sorry if you're tired of this home, hehe) [/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/Home.png[/img]
[b]WORKING EASTER RING / RING OF STONE / GLARIAL'S (H'WEEN) AMULET[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/easterring100.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/ringofstone.png[/img][IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/glarialsamulet.png[/img][IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/ringsworking.png[/img]
[b]CHAOTIC RAPIER AND MAUL STANCE AND ITEMS ADDED These are 5 second videos watch these two ;)[/b]: [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/2uh91nb/7]Chaotic Rapier[/URL] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/ifafc6/7]Chaotic Maul[/URL]
[b]NEW ITEMS ADDED:[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/newcoolitems1.jpg[/img]
[b]ALL NEW ARTEFACTS, activate them to claim money:[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/artefactsw00t.png[/img]
[b]NEW QUEST TAB FOR USEFUL STUFF:[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/newquesttabinterface.png[/img]
[b]NEW HP BARS[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/newhpbars.png[/img]
[b]COSTUME SHOP[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/Costumesshop.png[/img]
[b]RZP MINIGAME, level up skills to receive points to buy from the RZP exchange shop :)[/b] [IMG]http://i1213.photobucket.com/albums/cc465/sagi2/MY%20FIRST%20RELEASE/RZPMinigame.png[/img]
NO MORE PICS IM TIRED ATM :P
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/b] Client: http://www.filesonic.com/file/42452457 Source: http://www.filesonic.com/file/42451419
New link (updated 12 July 2011) (package): http://uppit.com/n8uxfw87k7cl/Sagi_X-evolution_V2_Final_Release.rar
[b][b]DOWNLOADS TILL NOW[/b] (last updated:November 21, 2010, 09:50:25 AM) [s]100 200 300 400 500 600 700 800 900 1000 2000 5000 10000 15000[/s] 20000[/b]
[b]CREDITS:[/b] Casterz/King/Sagi (Me) [b]+50%[/b] - updating server with loads thing Exion [b]+40%[/b] - his base that I used Moparscape helpers [b]+10%[/b]
[b]INFORMATION[/b] 1. I managed 280 people registered and 40+ playing together the server in the first month, so hope you make that too... ;) 2. This is my first source and i request you to give positive comments as it comprises of all my work. 3. I don't want more downloads and few comments. I want comment on how can I improve it, is it good, etc or i'll remove it if its not appreciated. 4. Leech if you wanna, i don't really care but call me to your server if you get many people ;) [/CENTER]

item.title: [20k+ Downloads] [PI] Sagi X-evolution
item.dc:creator: @Andys_Awesome Andys Awesome
item.description:
@Andys_Awesome wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:384, topic:368936”][quote author=daemonic123 link=topic=465068.msg3734533#msg3734533 date=1314841092]
this source is a mess i’ve fixed up 15+ dupes now you got a lot of basic ones i noticed but none the less its riddled with dupes… the playerhasitem method doesnt check slots properly… and lots of trade and duel methods, alch methods, equip item methods, drop item methods, dont even check if you have the item or not so fake packets thrown at it = DUPE. the combat system unarmed is bugged, multi wildy sign bugged, duel arena logout bugged… range iteself is completely messed up u hit garbage till u spec on npc’s then ur msb attk is boosted. with crystal bow better arrows = higher hit even though not supposed to take arrows… all of this i fixed but its just a mess… aswell barrows armor thats damaged if u wear head shows thru helm, lots of other items need proper defining.

THE BIGGEST DUPE OF ALL in privatemessaging.java search for handlestatus looks like
c.getPA().handleStatus(i,i2,i3);, also search for handlestatus in general throughout server n delete that shit cuz sanity put it in there as an exploit. if u modify client.java CLIENT SIDED and client sided add a command involving frame(59) (ignore list) it corresponds to the handlestatus method server sided n ppl can just spawn on ur server…/.

EVERY server base that anyone starts with is filled with glitches though, and overall as a starter source this is a great one. i’m currently a week from release after 4 months of heavy modifications.
[/quote]

All of that is a 10 minute- fix.[/quote]

Im using a different source but I have the same log-out glitch. I’ve been trying to fix this for hours… I’ve looked everywhere on different forums, google. Found this on a moparscape search. Please give me a push in the right direction

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Eye_Pod Eye Pod
item.description:
@Eye_Pod wrote:

I’m new to coding and i LOVE THIS!, Thank you soo much! 10/10!

EDIT: You said it had chaotic rapier/longsword/maul? The item codes i have dont seem to match… I’ve got;
Rapier-18349
Longsword-18351
Maul-18353

If someone has the working codes, please tell me, Also Another big problem, Where’s the Monk of Zamorak, or Zamorak Mage that “Teleports you around”, I cant seem to find it at home, Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [20k+ Downloads] [PI] Sagi X-evolution
item.dc:creator: @FFkingdom FFkingdom
item.description:
@FFkingdom wrote:

This is such a fantastic game! ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D

Not everyone is going to be happy but i certainly am! For the amount that I know on how to code, as well as the learning I want to do this is perfect. In time I am hoping to create a completely unique game for my visitors to my website.
I would like to ask Sagi permission to do so, make any changes I wish to change, of course providing full credit where it is due on the website page and in-game.
I might need help with things i have not tackled thus far like changing where you enter into the game for the first time, and what you get. Maybe the graphics and if it really is as easy as changing the ones in the cache and then saving them back to there. Would someone let me know where to go to find the answers to these little things?

Again just absolutely love it Simply a great base for someone like me to begin with ;D
If someone will show me how to rep I will do so in abundance!
for now I guess a perfect 10/10 Rep+++++++++++++++++ is the best i can do
grats m8

Edit: A small question. Some things compile as they should. Changed things like my player rights, added NPC’s added money to the bank. But when I have changed other things, it does not compile.
Adding/removing added objects (done in the objectmanager)
Changing the Sign in and welcome message
Doors, ladders, stairs, and levers.
None of these will include in the compile.

I have even deliberately added something wrong to a page to get an error, but the compiler only says Press any key to continue…
I am using the 2.compiler located in source/data. Is this the correct compiler? Even after changing the others to each of the java versions I have, they have not been successful. Only this one. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
